dcterms:description: A dataset for recognizing counterfactual thinking in social media texts, containing examples of counterfactual statements categorized into distinct types.

dcterms:description: A dataset for 'what if...' reasoning over procedural text, designed to answer hypothetical questions based on provided paragraphs.
